text:
No Person shall have recourse against the City for any loss, cost, expense, or damage arising out of the enforcement of any provision or requirement of this Chapter, a Franchise, or other Applicable Law. Notwithstanding the foregoing, nothing herein precludes a Person from seeking and obtaining any injunctive relief against the City. 
(Added by Ord. 58-00, File No. 000198, App. 4/7/2000)
